subject: fix(ui): replace jargon in connection detail panel
body:
"Untitled Connection" → "(no title)" — non-technical users shouldn't see
"untitled" as a concept. Plain parenthetical is clearer as a missing-data
indicator.

"Relationship label" placeholder → "e.g. works at, depends on" — examples
are more helpful than abstract terminology.

Tags: ui, terminology
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: import-compatibility
Semver: patch
